thread.title: How to watch the Champions League round of 16 matches, like Man City vs. Monaco
thread.title_full: How to watch the Champions League round of 16 matches, like Man City vs. Monaco

author: Brian
title: How to watch the Champions League round of 16 matches, like Man City vs. Monaco
text:
Feb 21, 2017 at 10:58a ET 0Shares 
Manchester City, Monaco, Bayer Leverkusen and Atletico Madrid are all in action on Tuesday as the first legs of the Champions League’s round of 16 continue. On Wednesday, Sevilla, Leicester, Juventus and Porto take the stage in Europe’s biggest tournament. 
Here are all the details you need to know to ensure you don’t miss a moment of the action. 
Fans can watch matches online or stream them on a mobile or home device using the FOX Sports GO and FOX Soccer 2GO apps, as well as on foxsportsgo.com . Streaming links for each individual match can be found below. 
Tuesday’s coverage begins with pregame show at 2 p.m. ET, simulcast on both FS1 and FS2. After that, Manchester City and Monaco will square off on FS1 at 2:30 p.m. ET . At the same time, Bayer Leverkusen will host Atletico Madrid on FS2 . After the matches wrap up, stick around for postgame analysis and highlights. 
On Wednesday, the coverage follows suit. The pregame show begins at 2 p.m. ET on FS1 and FS2, with matches kicking off on both channels at 2:30 p.m. ET. Sevilla host Leicester on FS1, while Porto and Juventus lock horns on FS2 . 
It’s a busy week, to be sure. Don’t miss out. 
Streaming links: 
Manchester City vs. Monaco, Tuesday, 2:30 p.m. ET on FS1: http://a.fsgo.com/uaDf/PTjnTOIiSA 
Bayer Leverkusen vs. Atletico Madrid, Tuesday, 2:30 p.m. ET on FS2: http://a.fsgo.com/uaDf/ZtZkjbKiSA 
Sevilla vs. Leicester, Wednesday, 2:30 p.m. ET on FS1: http://a.fsgo.com/uaDf/GjnhYXMiSA 
Porto vs. Juventus, Wednesday, 2:30 p.m. ET on FS2: http://a.fsgo.com/uaDf/LK2hgEMiSA 0
